26th May 2020 at 2:20 pm
#48521
Madness
Member

BOSS Leadership has asked for training exercises in preparation for next week's operations.
Here are two to get you started. Please post some of your own.

[These are really nice, but not sure they count as training FOR challenge 9! They do make excellent additional exercises for advance codebreakers though! Harry]

Training exercise #1:

244356386961150726798506568090263492629634926067985063322496963492658679146244
356441633224963421679146809026263492658621086441679146586809026349267914638696

Training exercise #2:

This one is a double permutation. To make it harder, the lengths of the
permutations are coprime:

TASWEAHFEHYATWSWARASDDSTAAYORAOLLMCEMTFFOAINOAKSDEHSMLLAATRFOVCRRRTHAUTIESUS
GHEDASEDFODIOPMHALTLOIIOGUNRDOLHMTETKENAOADAUTAHTRISDTRSLYEYMEEDAECOUHOOLSNC
ODSOIGTTHUDIRVITAAODPELDITEEHNHOARWSAMTEYSUODREAAMRHHEURTTEKALMNEAWOYDOANAAG
NIASDDAKIOEEFSSNSORETMDESHCSSOIMYFAMECNTEONAITMSPOIRDITENHAESAEHSEEHMEOTDEHS
TAVOHNMGOINNOMNSIIERCAVDSLATIWNOLSEYSCAIMRETOHHTHFGENDILNEEDUTTHEVATRSAORHEH
AURTFDRAKTWLERAOIWYDTUSRATEAMSLEEEDHLAIMLNTEYHLOKADOMEITRODNUANMIOHAINGDSALS
ITYHLGDHASERIHOEYRBEMEMHWSMSAMIDSIATDOIYATLSDRUEEOMENODREAMTBLLIAWIDLOYTAOHN
ARMHURTDWURORFIBAMNETSTHYOUUHTTTOAHRESEEUWESRESIMSISAILHATEHEDMDEHCCUNLILHSK
GOATLNAYISMCUTAHSTTEYMGDADSIEVENSAAAAIMASLLETNNGHCTOIMPCUDESARRENTGEINHTSBOL
EWLNHAOFEKTPTIECADATWYAKMELRHIDALEINNAETGANHHHEANSGEHVOAYERDTSINUNATYTADTIKH
BASYKITHNECOKTAETASEOCHIOTNAOPLRLTESHTHEOVEITYNOOMNEELOOHTOLAKERGDATYRVEADUT
RAHNRGIIADSATAAEMFCINOCSFUNEKENYRWOOHOEIAALELRARSHDYTBWUROHWNIENASGIGITONFSN
TEDHNURAOCMIMDUSNIKEDARLYNCSNCOINEHTNRIELDTAOGMTLNSPMIETODYSPGLPKIAN
